trans-unit.source: Launches the Get Connected wizard within the calling application to enable network connectivity

seg-source.mrk: Launches the Get Connected wizard within the calling application to enable network connectivity

target.mrk: Launches the Get Connected wizard within the calling application to enable network connectivity

trans-unit.source: Specifies which the dialog should be launched, valid values:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies which the dialog should be launched, valid values:

target.mrk: Specifies which the dialog should be launched, valid values:

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies an additional options. This parameter can be one or more of the following values.

seg-source.mrk: This parameter can be one or more of the following values.

target.mrk: This parameter can be one or more of the following values.

trans-unit.source: 1 - Do not display the Get Connected wizard page that shows whether or not the user has a working or active Internet connection.

seg-source.mrk: 1 - Do not display the Get Connected wizard page that shows whether or not the user has a working or active Internet connection.

target.mrk: 1 - Do not display the Get Connected wizard page that shows whether or not the user has a working or active Internet connection.

trans-unit.source: 2 - Do not display the Get Connected wizard page that shows a list of existing internet connections.

seg-source.mrk: 2 - Do not display the Get Connected wizard page that shows a list of existing internet connections.

target.mrk: 2 - Do not display the Get Connected wizard page that shows a list of existing internet connections.

trans-unit.source: 4 - Hide the finish page of the Get Connected wizard.

seg-source.mrk: 4 - Hide the finish page of the Get Connected wizard.

target.mrk: 4 - Hide the finish page of the Get Connected wizard.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Handle to the parent window that called this API.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the parent window that called this API.

target.mrk: Handle to the parent window that called this API.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

trans-unit.source: This function requires Windows Vista or later.

seg-source.mrk: This function requires Windows Vista or later.

target.mrk: This function requires Windows Vista or later.

trans-unit.source: Launch the Get Connected wizard within the calling application to enable Internet connectivity

seg-source.mrk: Launch the Get Connected wizard within the calling application to enable Internet connectivity

target.mrk: Launch the Get Connected wizard within the calling application to enable Internet connectivity
